title: Fuel Supply Proposal – Athens International Airport (ATH)
supplier_comments: SAF options can be discussed in subsequent rounds if required by Arkia. Prices exclude any applicable VAT or excise.
ai_summary: BP Aviation offers a fixed price of USD 3.185 per USG for Jet A-1 fuel at Athens International Airport, valid from 15 August to 30 September 2025. Into-plane and handling fees are USD 0.035 and USD 0.005 per USG, respectively. Taxes and airport fees are excluded, and payment terms are net 30 days. No take-or-pay applies for Year 1, and the estimated annual volume is 1,800,000 USG.
